name: My Mom Got Corona
description:
Save your mom from Corona Virus before its too late!

My mom Got Corona is a 2d Platformer game which you have a quest to save your mom from Corona Virus.

The game requires you not only be skilled at the game but mentally focused aswell. Your Decisions are Critical in every aspect of the game.

If you ever encounter Bugs please Screenshot and send it to me at prehacks0942@gmail.com, i would deeply appreciate it.

Don't Forget to Enjoy the game.
